segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman is drying dishes, humming maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water everywhere on the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even looking, her back to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot in the puddle, she could slip so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's about to tip over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get hurt, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this while the mom is clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
